info.description: API for managing scholarship applications, allocations, and administration
info.title: Scholarship Management System API

get.description: Get recent system activities and audit log
Get paginated list of scholarships for admin management
Get comprehensive system statistics for admin dashboard
Get paginated list of users for admin management
Get paginated list of scholarship allocations with filters (Admin/Officer only)

post.description: Create new scholarship allocation for approved application (Admin/Officer only)

get.description: Get budget allocation summary with utilization rates (Admin/Officer only)
Get detailed information about a specific allocation (Admin/Officer only)

post.description: Approve a pending scholarship allocation (Admin/Officer only)
Mark allocation as disbursed with transfer reference details (Admin/Officer only)
Create a new scholarship application (Student only)

get.description: Get current user's scholarship applications (Student only)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Register a new user account

get.description: Get list of documents for a specific application

post.description: Upload supporting document for scholarship application (Student only)

parameters.description: Document file (PDF, JPEG, PNG, DOC, DOCX - max 10MB)
parameters.name: file

post.description: Verify or reject multiple documents at once (Admin/Officer only)

get.description: Get document verification statistics, optionally filtered by application
Get list of available document types for uploads

delete.description: Delete own uploaded document (only if not verified, Student only)

get.description: Download a specific document file

post.description: Verify or reject an uploaded document (Admin/Officer only)
Allow student to book an interview appointment for their application
Allow student to confirm their scheduled interview appointment
Submit interview evaluation and scoring (Interviewer/Admin/Officer only)

get.description: Get interview appointments for current user (different view for students vs interviewers)
Get list of interview schedules with optional scholarship filter (Admin/Officer only)

post.description: Create a new interview schedule for scholarship applications (Admin/Officer only)

get.description: Get paginated list of notifications for current user

post.description: Send notification to multiple users at once (Admin/Officer only)
Mark all unread notifications as read for current user
Send a notification to a user (Admin/Officer only)

get.description: Get list of available notification types
Get count of unread notifications for current user

delete.description: Delete a notification for current user

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read

get.description: Generate comprehensive application report with filters (Admin/Officer only)
Generate budget allocation and utilization report (Admin/Officer only)
Get comprehensive dashboard statistics for admin overview
Export report data in various formats (Admin/Officer only)
Generate scholarship utilization and statistics report (Admin/Officer only)
Generate student scholarship statistics and success rates report (Admin/Officer only)

post.description: Create a new scholarship funding source (Admin/Officer only)

get.description: Get list of scholarships with optional filters and pagination
Get student's scholarship application history
Get current user's student academic profile

post.description: Create or update student academic profile

get.description: Get current user's profile information
Get paginated list of users with search and filters (Admin only)

parameters.description: Search by name, email, or username
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new user account (Admin only)

get.description: Get list of all available roles in the system (Admin only)
Get detailed information about a specific user (Admin only)

post.description: Deactivate a user account (Admin only)
Reactivate a user account (Admin only)
Assign a role to a specific user (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a specific role from a user (Admin only)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
